name: Exana Updates
description: News and updates about Exana protocol developments, releases, and roadmap

style_guidelines.format: Clear and concise, focus on benefits to users
examples: Exana v2.5 just rolled out with improved swap efficiency and lower gas costs!
Our latest protocol update introduces optimized MEV protection - check out the docs to learn more

name: Liquidity Incentives
description: Updates about Exana liquidity mining programs, rewards, and incentives

style_guidelines.format: Lead with key metrics (APY, rewards), include clear CTA
examples: New incentive program live! Earn up to 24% APY by providing EXANA-ETH liquidity
Liquidity rewards boosted for EXANA-USDC! Now offering 2x points until Friday

name: Security Announcements
description: Important security information, audit results, and safety recommendations

style_guidelines.format: Clear facts, straightforward language, actionable advice
examples: Security update: Our contracts have passed a comprehensive audit by CertiK with zero critical findings
Important: All Exana users should update to v3.2 to benefit from the latest security enhancements

name: Community Spotlight
description: Highlighting community contributions, governance participation, and user success stories

style_guidelines.format: Recognize specific contributions, tag community members when appropriate
examples: Shoutout to @ExanaWhiz for the amazing analytics dashboard that's helping our community track protocol metrics!
Community proposal EXP-42 has passed with 92% approval - decentralized governance at its finest

name: Market Analysis
description: Insights about DeFi market trends relevant to Exana users

style_guidelines.format: Present data points, offer context, avoid price predictions
examples: Exana trading volume up 37% this week despite broader market volatility - a sign of growing protocol adoption
DeFi yield comparison: Exana consistently outperforming similar protocols in risk-adjusted returns this month
